Friends, for my final foolish treat,...
...a hack best described by one word:...
Its comedy level is rated tops.
I call it my April Fools' Brocco Pops.
For this, you'll need lollipops with wrappers, broccoli, scissors and that's all.
Take off the wrapper and remove the candy from the stick...
Cut pieces of broccoli in round shapes to look like a lollipop.
Stick the broccoli onto the lollipop stick,...
